about_the_game:
☪ Introduction ☪

"Transparent Her and Real Me" is a multi-character, multi-ending "super long" bishoujo game developed and published by Kuwei Studio.

☪ Game Features ☪

· 2 Playable Heroine Characters
· Full Voice Acting for All Characters Throughout the Entire Game
· Full Live2D Animation Performance
· Over One Million Words of Script, Over 100 CGs (This total does not include variations)
·high-quality and melodious original music
· Unique "Real-time Dialogue System" Gameplay

☪ Story Origin ☪

The story begins in a small, sunless room in Hucheng.
"I," who has been a shut-in obsessed with the second dimension and on leave from school for a year,
decide to return to university life under the meticulous care of my guardian sister, Shimeng.
A girl who should have been just another passerby to me
unexpectedly appeared before my eyes———
CG! I saw a CG!
Thus, in a world that should have been for "two people,"
a "three-person" romantic comedy unfolds!

Characters


Your sister and guardian, a genius honor student at Hucheng's top girls' high school.
Skilled in cooking and fashion. Although she often bickers with you, she always takes care of you.
Since "that time," she has vowed to become strong and excellent enough to protect you, who was once deeply hurt.

……"There is nothing that can separate us again. I won't allow such a thing to exist."


The first female friend you made other than your sister, a journalism student at Hucheng Normal University.
Gentle and introverted, she blushes easily. Currently working part-time at holyfiremeow club to support herself and pursue her dreams.
Passionate about bishoujo and otome games, she can easily detect your level of obsession with the second dimension.

……"The world lights up its faded stars for its children.
……"Like the vibrant colors dancing on the dome, singing the elegy of dawn to the night."


Shimeng's classmate and friend, who has a bit of a chuunibyou complex.

……"I... I, of course, deeply love my servant!"


Shimeng's classmate and friend, who seems to have an indescribable relationship with Xiaobing.

……"Even if you are her brother, I won't go easy on you~"

Stage Background



Filmed on location, recreating the most authentic "Hucheng" scenery!
Locations include but are not limited to North Bund, Lujiazui, Shanghai Jiao Tong University,
Shanghai No. 3 Girls' High School, and Shanghai's "Akihabara."

System


· Live2D Performance
All CG and character sprites are implemented with Live2D, ushering in the next era of bishoujo games.


· Customizable Name
The protagonist's name is decided by you!
(*Shimeng will inherit the player's custom surname)


· Real-time Dialogue
It's impolite to stay silent when talking with a bishoujo, a romance adventure is more than just simple choices.


· Phone Interaction
Three people but four group chats? Connections through the internet, cherish this bond.

Disclaimer: All characters in this game are over 18 years old at the time of the game's events.
